ca.cwfgm.psaas.api.frontier.output

Class StatsFile

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.cwfgm.psaas.api.frontier.output.StatsFile
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IValidable

    public abstract class StatsFile
extends Object
implements IValidable
    An output file to mimic the Prometheus stats view. Contains stats from each timestep of a scenarios simulation.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      StatsFile()

      boolean addColumn(GlobalStatistics col)
      Add a new column to the statistics file.

      The name of the output file.

      The file format to export to.
      LatLon getLocation() 
      String getScenarioName()
      The name of the scenario that this output is for (required).
      String getStreamName() 
      boolean isShouldStream()
      Should the file be streamed/uploaded to an external service after it has been created? The streaming services are defined by OutputStreamInfo and helper methods such as streamOutputToMqtt or streamOutputToGeoServer.

      Determine if all of the required values have been set.

      Should the file be streamed/uploaded to an external service after it has been created? The streaming services are defined by OutputStreamInfo and helper methods such as streamOutputToMqtt or streamOutputToGeoServer.
      void setWeatherStream(WeatherStream stream)
      Set a weather stream to use for exporting weather information to the stats file.

      • StatsFile

        public StatsFile()

    • Method Detail

      • addColumn

        public boolean addColumn(GlobalStatistics col)
                  throws IllegalArgumentException
        Add a new column to the statistics file.
        Parameters:
        col - The statistic to add. Valid statistics are:
        • DATE_TIME
        • ELAPSED_TIME
        • TIME_STEP_DURATION
        • TEMPERATURE
        • DEW_POINT
        • RELATIVE_HUMIDITY
        • WIND_SPEED
        • WIND_DIRECTION
        • PRECIPITATION
        • HFFMC
        • HISI
        • DMC
        • DC
        • HFWI
        • BUI
        • FFMC
        • ISI
        • FWI
        • TIMESTEP_AREA
        • TIMESTEP_BURN_AREA
        • TOTAL_AREA
        • TOTAL_BURN_AREA
        • AREA_GROWTH_RATE
        • EXTERIOR_PERIMETER
        • EXTERIOR_PERIMETER_GROWTH_RATE
        • ACTIVE_PERIMETER
        • ACTIVE_PERIMETER_GROWTH_RATE
        • TOTAL_PERIMETER
        • TOTAL_PERIMETER_GROWTH_RATE
        • FI_LT_10
        • FI_10_500
        • FI_500_2000
        • FI_2000_4000
        • FI_4000_10000
        • FI_GT_10000
        • ROS_0_1
        • ROS_2_4
        • ROS_5_8
        • ROS_9_14
        • ROS_GT_15
        • MAX_ROS
        • MAX_FI
        • MAX_FL
        • MAX_CFB
        • MAX_CFC
        • MAX_SFC
        • MAX_TFC
        • TOTAL_FUEL_CONSUMED
        • CROWN_FUEL_CONSUMED
        • SURFACE_FUEL_CONSUMED
        • NUM_ACTIVE_VERTICES
        • NUM_VERTICES
        • CUMULATIVE_VERTICES
        • CUMULATIVE_ACTIVE_VERTICES
        • NUM_ACTIVE_FRONTS
        • NUM_FRONTS
        • MEMORY_USED_START
        • MEMORY_USED_END
        • NUM_TIMESTEPS
        • NUM_DISPLAY_TIMESTEPS
        • NUM_EVENT_TIMESTEPS
        • NUM_CALC_TIMESTEPS
        • TICKS
        • PROCESSING_TIME
        • GROWTH_TIME
        Returns:
        True if the column was added, false if the column has already been added.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If the passed statistic is not in the list of valid statistics.

      • removeColumn

        public boolean removeColumn(GlobalStatistics col)
        Remove a column from the stats file.
        Parameters:
        col - The column to remove.
        Returns:
        True if the column was removed, false if it didn't exist.

      • setLocation

        public void setLocation(LatLon location)
        Set a location to use for exporting weather information to the stats file. Either this or setWeatherStream(ca.cwfgm.psaas.api.frontier.WeatherStream) should be used if weather information is to be added to the stats file.
        Parameters:
        location - The location that will be used for exporting weather information.

      • setWeatherStream

        public void setWeatherStream(WeatherStream stream)
        Set a weather stream to use for exporting weather information to the stats file. Either this or setLocation(ca.cwfgm.psaas.api.globals.LatLon) should be used if weather information is to be added to the stats file.
        Parameters:
        stream - A weather stream that will be used for exporting weather information.

      • isValid

        public boolean isValid()
        Determine if all of the required values have been set.
        Specified by:
        isValid in interface IValidable

      • isShouldStream

        public boolean isShouldStream()
        Should the file be streamed/uploaded to an external service after it has been created? The streaming services are defined by OutputStreamInfo and helper methods such as streamOutputToMqtt or streamOutputToGeoServer.

      • setShouldStream

        public void setShouldStream(boolean shouldStream)
        Should the file be streamed/uploaded to an external service after it has been created? The streaming services are defined by OutputStreamInfo and helper methods such as streamOutputToMqtt or streamOutputToGeoServer.

        The name of the scenario that this output is for (required).
